operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO phone_call_sessions (call_session_id, admin_id, admin_access_hash, participant_id, participant_access_hash, udp_p2p, udp_reflector, min_layer, max_layer, g_a, date) VALUES (:call_session_id, :admin_id, :admin_access_hash, :participant_id, :participant_access_hash, :udp_p2p, :udp_reflector, :min_layer, :max_layer, :g_a, :date)

operation.name: Select
operation.sql: SELECT id, call_session_id, admin_id, admin_access_hash, participant_id, participant_access_hash, udp_p2p, udp_reflector, min_layer, max_layer, g_a, g_b, date FROM phone_call_sessions WHERE call_session_id = :call_session_id
